# Schakel AI - AI Consultancy & Implementation
# Description: Wij automatiseren bedrijfsprocessen met praktische AI-oplossingen

## Company Information
- Name: Schakel AI B.V.
- Location: Coolsingel 65, 3012 AC Rotterdam, Netherlands
- Website: https://www.schakel.ai
- Email: info@schakel.ai
- KVK (Chamber of Commerce): 98312529
- BTW (VAT): NL868441119B01

## Core Expertise
Schakel AI specializes in practical AI implementation that delivers measurable results within 30 days. We focus on one process at a time, building working solutions that integrate seamlessly with existing workflows.

### AI Solutions We Provide:
1. **Workflow Automatisering** - Automate repetitive tasks and manual processes. Connect systems so tasks are automatically picked up, followed up, and completed.

2. **Klantenservice-AI (Chat & Voice)** - Smart AI assistants that handle customer questions, phone calls, and appointments directly. Available 24/7, multilingual, and always consistent in service.

3. **Interne Support Agents** - Virtual employees that answer HR, IT, and operational questions. Direct answers to policy questions, technical problems, and operational procedures, available day and night.

4. **AI Sales & Marketing** - AI systems that support lead qualification, follow-up and scheduling of appointments, and assist with marketing activities.

5. **Email Management** - AI that answers, sorts, and follows up on emails. From customer questions to internal communication, always appropriate and on time.

6. **Content Generatie** - From product descriptions to social posts and documentation - AI writes content that sounds like you wrote it yourself. Scalable, consistent, and time-saving.

## Team & Leadership

### Simon - Co-founder | Process Optimization & Results
- 11 years of transformation experience
- Built and scaled ROI Financials from employee to co-owner
- Successfully sold ROI Financials after optimizing company processes
- Expertise: Process optimization, business transformation, AI implementation strategy
- Philosophy: "AI is a means, not an end"
- Focus: Delivering concrete first steps instead of strategic roadmaps

### Rob - Co-founder | Data & AI Solutions
- Founded and scaled Easydash (Business Intelligence agency)
- Early adopter of BI tools in 2018 when market was skeptical
- Sold Easydash to focus on AI implementation
- Expertise: Data analysis, Business Intelligence, AI solution architecture, technical implementation
- Philosophy: "The best solutions emerge by starting, not by waiting"
- Focus: Building practical AI tools that actually work

## Our Approach (4-Week Method)

1. **Verkennen (Explore)** - We identify where you currently lose the most time and what can be solved immediately.

2. **Ontwerpen (Design)** - Together we choose which process to tackle first and determine what it needs to do.

3. **Implementeren (Implement)** - We build it, test with your team, and ensure it works in your daily process.

4. **Resultaat (Results)** - We measure the outcome and improve where necessary.

## Key Differentiators

- **30-Day Results**: Tangible, working solution within one month
- **Focus on One Process**: We don't spread thin - we solve one problem completely before moving to the next
- **Practical Implementation**: No theoretical plans or endless analysis - we build and deploy
- **Built on Experience**: Our founders optimized their own companies with AI before helping others
- **Measurable Impact**: From 20 hours of manual work to automated flows - we track and prove ROI

## Target Markets
- Netherlands (primary market)
- Dutch and English language support
- Industries: Professional services, e-commerce, SaaS, healthcare, finance

## Technology Stack
We work with:
- Large Language Models (OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini)
- Workflow automation platforms
- API integrations and custom development
- Voice AI for phone automation
- RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems

## Blog & Resources

### Latest Writing: Van Transcriptie naar Automatische Workflow
- URL: https://www.schakel.ai/blog/meeting-automation-center
- Published: November 30, 2025
- Author: Rob van Zutphen
- Topic: How we built a Meeting Automation Center that handles everything from transcription to tasks
- Key Topics: Fireflies.ai, Claude AI, workflow automation, SharePoint integration, Productive.io, two-layer prompting, approval workflows
- Reading Time: 10 minutes
- Summary: Complete walkthrough of our automated meeting workflow system. From the moment a meeting ends, transcripts are automatically retrieved, processed by Claude AI with custom prompts, converted to branded HTML documents, uploaded to SharePoint, drafted as emails in Outlook, and action items are created as tasks in Productive.io. Includes technical architecture, lessons learned about speaker identification, confidence scores, and the importance of approval workflows.

### Previous Writing: Website bouwen met AI
- URL: https://www.schakel.ai/blog/website-bouwen-met-ai
- Published: November 23, 2025
- Author: Rob van Zutphen
- Topic: Complete story about building schakel.ai using AI-first development and vibecoding
- Key Topics: Replit Agent 3, AI-first development, React + TypeScript + Vite, practical AI implementation, vibecoding workflow
- Reading Time: 12 minutes
- Summary: Detailed technical and practical guide about building a professional website with AI assistance, including architecture decisions, tech stack choices, and lessons learned from multiple AI-first projects

More blog posts: https://www.schakel.ai/blog
